dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, allowing others to see how they feel.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, not sharing them with others unless necessary.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and facts to solve problems, making informed decisions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and gut feelings to solve problems, often trusting their intuition.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and friendly, easily making new connections and friends.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social interactions, sometimes feeling overwhelmed in larger groups.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will base their decisions on logic and reason, weighing the pros and cons of each option.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and gut feelings to make decisions, often trusting their intuition.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively stand their ground and defend themselves, sometimes coming across as confrontational.
Your FarTwin will try to find common ground and compromise, often seeking peaceful resolutions to conflicts.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn and absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will primarily learn through visual aids, such as images and diagrams.
Your FarTwin will primarily learn through auditory means, such as listening to lectures or discussions.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk and uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new challenges and risks, often enjoying the thrill of the unknown.
Your FarTwin will approach risk with caution, weighing the pros and cons before making a decision.
